reviewText:
4 stories of evil that can also bee seen on the season 1-4 box set.

A Haunting takes real ghost stories and re-enacts them along with interviw clips with the actual people. The end result is a heavy atmospheric DVD that will give you shivers without throwing tons of gore and bad language.

There's nothing wrong with bad language and gore, but most movies now days ruin a good story with overkill. A Haunting does not.
